about_the_game:
Third-person horror action-adventure game fighting your way through an infected Mauritian village. Play as a local protagonist battling his way to understand the cause of this infection set in a third person setting.

The Demo
The demo you are about to play begins when the protagonist returns home one day, only to find that something has gone terribly wrong.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
